mapper.insert: insert into poetry_table(poetry_id,name, author, content, addition_info, class_info,class_info_explain, main_class,main_class_explain, source,source_explain, transfer_info, default_image_id) values ( #{poetry_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addition_info,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{class_info,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{class_info_explain,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{main_class,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{main_class_explain,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{source_explain,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transfer_info,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{default_image_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
